creator: david@catcode.com
text:
The following SVG does not produce the chemical formula for water followed
by Einstein's famous equation; the subscripts and superscripts stay in effect
even after the <tspan> element has closed.

<text x="10" y="30" style="font-size:12pt;">
	H<tspan dy="4">2</tspan>O and e=mc<tspan dy="-4">2</tspan>
	equations.
</text>

creator: tkormann@apache.org
text: I don't remember bella's email. She should be the one :)
